__e: They had this young girl trapped.
And you took a part of my ship away from one of my companions.
I heard they got one of those things up north that can fly.
They took the money,the car, all the coke.
- They wouldn't take their money back.
They took it and what did they give you?
Get the fella that killed him?
It adds up that you got yourselves the wrong guy.
They've taken the same route that we took to get here.
They almost got the chief, too, but he was too quick.
I don't know who you are or what you want.
I mean they caught the other two guys.
When did they take the files, last night?
No, though they say they're closer than they've been this whole week.
Why haven't they caught him yet?
They trapped him on the picture.
I mean not like for-real dead, but like sick dead.
Then everybody in the house, got your mom's sickness.
You idiots get an apartment with only one exit?
You know they've caught one of your men?
How can I tell her they cast a man instead of her?
